Authors: Fürst, Julia : {https://orcid.org/0000-0003-2547-933X} * Lindstädt, Birte : {https://orcid.org/0000-0002-8251-1597} * Perrar, Ines : {https://orcid.org/0000-0002-2830-6322} * Shutsko, Aliaksandra : {https://orcid.org/0000-0002-7091-5084} * Vandendorpe, Justine : {https://orcid.org/0000-0002-9421-8582} * NFDI4Health : {organization http://www.wikidata.org/entity/Q98380343}
Title: NFDI4Health Online Training Workshop on Research Data Management in (Bio-)Medicine
Description:
This slidedeck was used in a two day workshop on research data management (RDM). 
It covers topics such as research data and their life cycle, metadata, FAIR data principles, as well as guidelines on RDM. Additionally, it introduces NFDI4Health services (Publication Policy, Metadata Schema, Central Health Study Hub) as examples of useful tools for the different stages of the research data lifecycle. The slidedeck was designed so that it can also be used for self-study.
Keywords: research data management * biomedicine * open educational resources
